<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Get all locations"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/locations/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves all locations along with the count of servers in each location.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"statusCode":200,"message":"Locations found","error":null,"locations":[{"_id":"location_id","servers":5,"pid":123,"name":"Location Name","flag":"Country Flag","maxservers":100,"latencyurl":"http://latency.url","requiredRank":1,"maintenance":false,"requiredSubscriptions":["sub1","sub2"],"coinRenewal":{"amount":10,"hours":24},"platform":"PTERODACTYL or VIRTFUSION or SDORDER (private)"}]}}}}}},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"serverError":{"value":{"statusCode":500,"message":"Internal Server Error","error":"Internal Server Error"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
